items.Title: Battle Card Mission
items.Details:
Hi Survivors!

We’ve heard your feedback about the Jujutsu Battle Card mission. To make it more enjoyable and accessible for everyone, we've reduced the mission requirement for Itadori's Challenge to "Deal 200 damage with Divergent Fist".

Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us - your feedback helps us keep improving the game for all players. See you on the battlefield!

items.Title: SOCIAL SURVEY
items.Details:
Hi Survivors!

 The survey is related to your experience about Free Fire MAX game modes, including Craftland. Your input and suggestions is very important for us to improve on player experience! The survey will take around 5 - 7 minutes. Thank you for your time and for helping Free Fire MAX.

BOOYAH!

items.Title: Changes to JJK Weapons
items.Details:
Dear Survivors,

We’ve received feedback that the Desert Eagle - Recharge starts with only 7 rounds and pistol ammo is difficult to find in BR. We've made the following adjustments: you can now get 30 free pistol ammo in the Vending Machine for your Desert Eagle - Recharge.

Additionally, we’re still seeing feedback that the Kugisaki Hammer remains too strong and too easy to obtain. To address this, we’re increasing the price of the Hammer:

Hammer I: 50 (no change)
Hammer II: 50 → 100
Hammer III: 100 → 200

This change is live now.

Thank you for your continued feedback and support, and we wish you Happy Booyah!

items.Title: BP Avatar & CS Backpack
items.Details:
Dear Survivors,  

Due to a technical issue, two in-game items were configured wrongly. [b]This has since been fixed[/b]. Please see the details below: 
1. Booyah Pass Avatar: Stellar Sea Avatar (incorrect item: Scarlet Romance Avatar) 
2. CS-Ranked Season Goals Backpack: Backpack - S35 Exclusive: Fin (incorrect item: Backpack - Get Me Out)  

For players who claimed these rewards before the fix, we will be: 
- Crediting the correct items to your account, and 
- Removing the incorrect items that were previously issued.  

We sincerely apologize for the confusion caused and thank you for your understanding and continued support.

items.Title: Changes to JJK Hammer
items.Details:
Dear Survivors,

We've received feedbacks regarding the Jujutsu Hammer. Therefore, the stats of the Hammer will be adjusted to:
Kugisaki Hammer (Lv1/Lv2/Lv3):
Damage: -15%
Limb Damage: -25%
Magazine Size: 12 → 5

The adjustments have been made. Thank you for your feedback and support!

items.Title: Feedback Survey
items.Details:
Hi Survivor

In order to improve your gaming experience, we team want to better understand your preferences. Please share your feedback by filling up the survey.

Thank you for your time and feedbacks.

- Free Fire MAX Operations Team
